overview: Yuriy Marchuk was born in Lviv (Ukraine) in 1984. He has gained bachelor in Computer engineering in 2004, master’s degree in Specialized computer systems in 2006. He started his career as hardware engineer at Eleks software ldt in 2005, where he had a lot of experience in hardware platform development for a specific client in Las Vegas (http://www.fishertechnical.org). In 2007 he changed employer to Sapienware ltd (the firm that provides solutions with focus on engineering field and scientific investigations) and was appointed to new position as technical lead in hardware platform and algorithms integration, and has several successfully accomplished projects in automotive infotainment systems for big automobile manufacturers such as Daimler AG and BMW. Since 2010 he started working as IT consultant for the 40 Foundation, and is currently coordinating a few big web and scientific engineering projects that should be launched this year – Hubbub.fm is the first one!
